name: Blazing Scorcher
text: [Accelerate] As I'm played, you may pay 1 Energy and 1 Fury as an additional cost to have me enter ready.

name: Brazen Buccaneer
text: As you play me, you may discard a card as an additional cost. If you do, reduce my cost by 2 Energy.

name: Chemtech Enforcer
text: [Assault 2] (+2 Might while I'm an attacker.) When you play me, discard 1.

name: Disintegrate
text: Deal 3 to a unit at a battlefield. If this kills it, draw 1.

name: Flame Chompers
text: When you discard me, you may pay 1 Fury to play me.

name: Fury Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Fury. Activate this any time.

name: Legion Rearguard
text: [Accelerate] (As I'm played, you may pay 1 Energy and 1 Fury as an additional cost to have me enter ready.)

name: Magma Wurm
text: Other friendly units enter ready.

name: Noxus Hopeful
text: [Legion] I cost 2 Energy less. (Gain this effect if you’ve played another card this turn.)

name: Scrapyard Champion
text: [Legion] When you play me, discard 2 then draw 2. (Get the effect if you’ve played another card this turn.)

name: Jinx
text: [Accelerate] [Assault 2] As I'm played, you may pay 1 Energy and 1 Fury as an additional cost to have me enter ready. +2 Might while I'm an attacker.) When you play me, discard 2.

name: Tryndamere
text: When I conquer after an attack, if you damaged 5 or more excess damage to opponent’s units, you score 1 Point.

name: Vi
text: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) Recycle 1 from your trash: Give me +1 Might this turn.

name: Kadregrin the Infernal
text: When you play me, draw 1 for each of your units with 5 Might or more.

name: Seal of Fury
text: Exhaust: Add 0 Energy 1 Fury. Activate this any time.

name: Volibear
text: [Deflect 2] (Opponents must pay 2 Power to choose me with a spell or effect.) When I attack, deal 5 damage split among any number of enemy units here.

name: Calm Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Calm. Activate this any time.

name: Clockwork Keeper
text: As you play me, you may pay 1 Calm as an additional cost. If you do, draw 1.

name: Defy
text: [Reaction]  Counter a spell that costs no more than 4 Energy and no more than 1 Power.

name: En Garde
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Give a friendly unit +1 Might. Then an additional +1 Might if it is the only unit you control there.

name: Meditation
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) As an additional cost to play me, you may exhaust a friendly unit. If you do, draw 2. Otherwise, draw 1.

name: Wielder of Water
text: While I'm attacking or defending alone, I have +2 Might.

name: Discipline
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Give a unit +2 Might this turn. Draw 1.

name: Wind Wall
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Counter a spell.

name: Seal of Calm
text: Exhaust: Add 0 Energy 1 Calm. Activate this any time.

name: Yasuo
text: When I attack, deal damage equal to my Might to an enemy here.

name: Mental Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Mental. Activate this any time.

name: Stupefy
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Give a unit -1 Might this turn (minimum 1). Draw 1.

name: Watchful Sentry
text: [Deathknell] Draw 1. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Wrath of Echoes
text: The first time a friendly unit dies each turn, draw 1.

name: Unchecked Power
text: [Focused] (Play only during your turn outside a showdown.) [Epic] (This starts a showdown.) Exhaust all friendly units, then deal 12 to all units at battlefields.

name: Challenge
text: Choose a friendly unit and an enemy unit. They deal damage equal to their Mights to each other.

name: Mobilize
text: Play your top rune exhausted. If you can't, draw 1.

name: Physical Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Physical. Activate this any time.

name: Stormclaw Ursine
text: [Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.) When you play me, play your top rune exhausted.

name: Catalyst of Aeons
text: Play your top 2 Runes exhausted. If you can't, draw 1.

name: Carnivorous Snapvine
text: When you play me, choose a unit. We deal damage equal to our Mights to each other.

name: Vollhear
text: [Tank] [Shield 3] (I must be assigned combat damage first. +3 Might while I'm a defender.) When an opponent moves to a battlefield other than mine, draw 1. (My base is not a battlefield.)

name: Deadbloom Predator
text: [Deflect 2] (Opponents must pay 1 Power to choose me with a spell or effect.) You may play me to an occupied enemy battlefield.

name: Miss Fortune
text: [Ganking] [Accelerate] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield. As I'm played, you may pay 1 Energy 1 Physical as an additional cost to have me enter ready.) The first time I move each turn, you may ready another card.

name: Cemetery Attendant
text: When you play me, return a unit from your trash to your hand.

name: Chaotic Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Chaos. Activate this any time.

name: Gust
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Return a unit with 3 Might or less to its owner's hand.

name: Rebuke
text: Return a unit at a battlefield to its owner's hand.

name: Stealthy Pursuer
text: When a friendly unit moves from my location, I may be moved with it.

name: Undercover Agent
text: [Deathknell] Discard 2 then draw 2. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Traveling Merchant
text: When I move, discard 1 then draw 1.

name: Kayn
text: [Ganking] (I can move from battlefield to battlefield.) If I have moved twice this turn, I don't take damage.

name: Maddened Marauder
text: [Tank] (I must be assigned combat damage first.) When you play me, move a unit from a battlefield to its base.

name: Jinx
text: When you discard one or more careds, ready me and give me +1 Might this turn.

name: Miss Fortune
text: You may play me to an open battlefield. Friendly units may be played to open battlefields.

name: Possession
text: Move an enemy from a battlefield to YOUR base exhausted. You now control it.

name: Seal of Discord
text: Exhaust: Add 0 Energy 1 Chaos. Activate this any time.

name: Cruel Patron
text: As an additional cost to play me, kill a friendly unit.

name: Cull
text: [Focused] (Play only during your turn outside a showdown.) Each player kills on of their units.

name: Faithful Manufactor
text: When you play me, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token here.

name: Hidden Blade
text: [Hidden] (Hide this facedown at a battlefield you control for 1 Power. Play as a Reaction here on a later turn for 1 Energy.) Kill a unit at a battlefield. Its controller draws 2.

name: Order Rune
text: Exhaust: Add 1 Energy. Recycle me: Add 1 Order. Activate this any time.

name: Soaring Scout
text: [Deathknell] Play your top run exhausted. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Vanguard Captain
text: [Legion] When you play me, play two 1 Might Recruit unit tokens here. (Gain this effect if you’ve played another card this turn.)

name: Machine Evangel
text: [Deathknell] Play three 1 Might Recruit unit tokens into your base. (When I die, get the effect.)

name: Grand Strategem
text: Give friendly units +5 Might this turn.

name: Harnessed Dragon
text: When you play me, kill a unit.

name: Seal of Unity
text: Exhaust: Add 0 Energy 1 Order. Activate this any time.

name: Viktor
text: When another non-Recruit unit you control dies, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token into your base.

name: Relentless Storm
text: When you play a unit with +5 Might, you may exhaust me to play your top rune exhausted.

name: Stormbringer
text: [Focused] (Play only during your turn outside a showdown.) [Epic] (This starts a showdown.) Choose a friendly unit in your base. Deal damage equal to its Might to all enemies at a battlefield, then move your unit there.

name: Loose Cannon
text: At start of your Beginning Phase, draw 1 if you have 1 or fewer cards in your hand.

name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
text: [Focused] (Play only during your turn outside a showdown.) Deal 5 to a unit anywhere. When you score, you may discard a card to return me from your trash to your hand.

name: Unforgiven
text: Energy 2, Exhaust: Move a friendly unit to or from your base.

name: Last Breath
text: Ready a friendly unit. It deals damage equal to its Might to an enemy at a battlefield.

name: Machine Herald
text: Energy 2, Exhaust: Play a 1 Might Recruit unit token.

name: Siphon Power
text: [Reaction] (This may be played in response to another spell or ability.) Choose a battlefield. Give friendly units there +1 Might and enemy units there -1 Might (minimum 1) until end of turn.

name: Altar to Unity
text: When you hold here, play a 1 Might Recruit unit token in your base.

name: Obelisk of Power
text: Players play one additional rune during their first Runic Phase this game.

name: Reaver's Row
text: When you defend here, you may move a friendly unit here to base.

name: Targon's Peak
text: When you conquer here, choose 2 runes. Ready them at the end of this turn.

name: The Grand Plaza
text: When you hold here, if you have 7+ units here, you win the game.

name: Trifarian War Camp
text: Units Here have +1 Might. (Including attackers.)

name: Void Gate
text: Spells and abilities affecting units here each deal 1 Bonus Damage. (Each instance of damage the spell deals is increased by 1.)

name: Windswept Hillock
text: Units here have [Ganking]. (They can move battlefield to battlefield.)

name: Zaun Warrens
text: When you conquer here, discard 1 then draw 1.
